info.brief_description: some of the girls from Video Games and Anime need some change in their lives.
info.description:
Some of the Video game and anime girls need some changes in their live's, including changes to their own Bodies. don't hold back and have fun. WG, GTS, Expansion, Shrinking, and more to help out these ladies. just keep it PG-13 and no Scat, or Feet or nasty stuff. Vore is allowed though.

do what you can to help out the girls and don't hold back.

no one liner stuff either. make it into para-graphs and more. or at least a full sentence. keep it interesting.
info.pretty_title: Changing fun for the VG/Anime girls.
